name: UrbanDrive
description: A modern car rental platform that allows users to browse, book, and manage car rentals with ease. Includes admin and host dashboards, payment systems (SSLCOMMERZ, Stripe), and analytics charts.

name: TeachTack Blogs
description: A responsive blog website where users can explore educational blog posts categorized by topic. Includes search filtering, pagination, and comment features.

name: onTimeNews
description: A real-time news web app fetching data from a public API, allowing users to read the latest headlines and filter news by category. Includes mobile responsiveness and dark mode.
